anchorMove.name: Unkillable
anchorMove.description: Unless your body is completely destroyed (incinerated, etc), you will come back to life from beyond death. Additionally, you heal very rapidly. Every 4 hours, no matter what the circumstances, roll +Mythos:

outcomes.7-9: You heal 1 Harm, but are at a -1 ongoing on any physical activities until your next Rapid Healing roll
outcomes.6-: You heal 1 Harm, but mark Fade against your Mythos

flaw.name: Everything Hurts
flaw.description: Describe a past injury that killed you, and how scars from it are hindering your current action. Take -1 ongoing on any related rolls for this scene to mark Attention on your Mythos.

additionalMoves.name: Get Behind Me!
additionalMoves.description: Roll against the better of +Mythos or (+Attribute+1) on the Protect and Serve move. You count as having an additional 1-Armor against any Harm taken from that Move.

flaw.name: Martyr
flaw.description: Any time one of your Crew takes Harm that you feel you could have prevented, take 1 Stress to mark Attention on your Mythos

additionalMoves.name: New Faces, Same People (Empath)
additionalMoves.description: When you take time to closely observe someone (MCs call on what counts), you can always roll +Smarts to Change the Game on any Moxie move, and you always get +1 hold, even on a roll of 6-

flaw.name: Voices in my Head
flaw.description: The emotions and thoughts of others sometimes overwhelm you, causing confusion and stress

anchorMove.name: Investigator
anchorMove.description: Whenever Taking the Investigate a Mystery move, you always take 1 additional hold, even on a 6-. Additionally, your Investigate a Mystery Hold does not have to be spent within a scene, and can be used at any time. You can always spend your hold from Investigate a Mystery to Ask Any Question.

flaw.name: Curiosity... well, you know
flaw.description: Any time that it would be wiser not to investigate something, you may investigate it anyway to mark Attention on your Logos.

additionalMoves.name: I Used to be a Cop (Skillset: Law Enforcement)
additionalMoves.description: On any roll where you can justify how police skills would be relevant, roll the better of +Logos or (+Attribute+1). Examples would include (but are not limited to) aggressive driving, breaking and entering, and interrogation

flaw.name: To Harass and to Harm
flaw.description: Any time your police instincts would cause you to bully, act corrupt, or bend the rules, either give in to your baser instincts and do something terrible, or take 1 Stress to avoid doing so. In either case mark Attention to your Logos.

additionalMoves.name: Friends on the Force
additionalMoves.description: Once per Session, you may Work your Connections to contact a Law Enforcement Officer without choosing a contact already on your sheet. Pick a name and expertise

flaw.name: Badge of Honor
flaw.description: When asking favors from police contacts, you may be asked to help with something questionable. Take 1 Stress to refuse or mark Attention on your Logos

contacts.name: Vanessa Li, RN
contacts.description: No-nonsense, petite, wiry, acerbic. Left him while he was still a cop

contacts.name: Dexter White, Magical Librarian
contacts.relationship: Jake always brings him interesting puzzles
contacts.description: Keeper of the mystic archive, Rift who can shapechange into animals, Tends to work late into the night

contacts.name: Marcus Telfair, Party Animal
contacts.description: Casual drug dealer, occasional prostitute, rift - bacchus, ageless, can literally go all night, totally unreliable and selfish
